descriptionHtml:
Didn\'t  like the original paralyze enchantment, so I\'ve changed it to a more effective one that gives you 100% chance to paralyze the target. Charges and duration values also have been changed...slightly...With a 30sec duration 1 grand soul gem should give you around 100-150 shots. This might be changed later, but personally I don\'t really like to refill soul gems and recharge weapons, so we\'ll see. Hope you enjoy it!

Install: 
-Unrar Paralyze.rar
-Copy Paralyze.esp to \"The Elder Scrolls V - Skyrim/Data\" folder
-Check out Data Files option at Skyrim Start just to make sure it has been activated
-Enjoy

Uninstall:
-Delete Paralyze.esp from  \"The Elder Scrolls V - Skyrim/Data\" folder

Bugs:
-none that known but report anything if you find one

***Updated***

Edited Paralyze Enchantment added with just a slightly changed random percentage upon request. More information in the Readme file.
author: Velgdran Dragal
